name: Primitive Wars
storyline: Once upon a time, several tribes lived on the Isle of Jura, constantly fighting among themselves. But the warrior named Ruwata, by his strength and his bravery succeeded in uniting the island of Jura. The long-awaited time has arrived, in which Primitives and Elves lived in peace. But after Ruwata's death, demons and the Tyranos tribe appeared on the island and a war broke out.
summary: Primitive Wars is a real time strategy computer game developed by Wizard Soft and published by Arxel Tribe
